mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(pro_code, pro_name, pro_price,pro_desc,pro_image) VALUES(#{pro_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price},#{pro_desc},#{pro_image})
mapper.select: SELECT pro_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_desc, pro_image from product;
SELECT pro_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_desc, pro_image from product where pro_code like '%P%'
SELECT pro_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_desc, pro_image from product where pro_code like '%T%'
SELECT pro_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_desc, pro_image from product where pro_code like '%O%'
